Package CityStreetLDLinkedListGTU

Class LDLinkedListStreet

java.lang.Object
CityStreetLDLinkedListGTU.LDLinkedListStreet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class LDLinkedListStreet extends Object implements Cloneable
LDLinkedListStreet class provides a buildable two dimensional, and two sided space for CityBuilding type buildings.

    • LDLinkedListStreet

      public LDLinkedListStreet()
      No parameter constructor sets every field to its default value.

    • LDLinkedListStreet

      public LDLinkedListStreet(int lengthOfStreet) throws Exception
      Constructor takes only lengthOfStreet of the street and sets the value according to the parameter.
      Parameters:
      lengthOfStreet - total length of the street.
      Throws:
      Exception - if lengthOfStreet is less than 10.

  • Method Details

    • getLengthOfStreet

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • atFront

      public CityBuilding atFront(int index) throws Exception
      Accessor for getting the building at frontBuildings array.
      Parameters:
      index - index of array.
      Returns:
      building at located index is returned.
      Throws:
      Exception - if index is out of bounds.

    • addFront

      public void addFront(CityBuilding building) throws Exception
      Adds CityBuilding to front side of the street.
      Parameters:
      building - CityBuilding type parameter.
      Throws:
      Exception - if street length is exceeded or that place is already occuppied.

    • addBack

      public void addBack(CityBuilding building) throws Exception
      Adds CityBuilding to back side of the street.
      Parameters:
      building - CityBuilding type parameter.
      Throws:
      Exception - if street length is exceeded, place is already occuppied, or same reference is in the street.
